#summary osgBullet compatibility by version

|| *osgBullet* || *!OpenSceneGraph* || *Bullet* || *osgWorks* ||
|| 1.0 || 2.6.1, 2.8.x || 2.74, 2.75 || 1.0 ||
|| 1.1 || 2.6.1, 2.8.x || 2.74, 2.75, 2.76{{{(*)}}} || 1.1 ||

{{{(*)}}} osgBullet v1.1 is compatible with the core collision detection and rigid body dynamics features of Bullet 2.76. Due to removal of !ColladaConverter in Bullet 2.76, you must build *osgBullet* with the USE_COLLADA CMake flag unselected.
